text: Miecław's State was created by the former cześnik of king Mieszko II, Miecław in the times of the crisis inside the Piast Monarchy. The State fell after the battle with Casimir I the Restorer where Miecław died during the fight. ==See also== * Miecław * Pagan reaction in Poland Category:States and territories established in 1037 Category:11th century in Poland
title: Miecław's State
